GPU Monitor is now back on the left menu.
The charts are not functioning even after a refresh:
GPU Metrics
GPU Active (%)
Temperature (°C)
Memory Used (MiB)

gpu-monitor:14  GET https://192.168.0.100:9090/cockpit/@localhost/*/po.js net::ERR_ABORTED 404 (ERROR)Understand this error
gpu-monitor:13  GET https://192.168.0.100:9090/cockpit/@localhost/*/po.manifest.js net::ERR_ABORTED 404 (ERROR)Understand this error
gpu-monitor:1 Refused to execute script from 'https://192.168.0.100:9090/cockpit/@localhost/*/po.manifest.js' because its MIME type ('text/html') is not executable, and strict MIME type checking is enabled.Understand this error
gpu-monitor:1 Refused to execute script from 'https://192.168.0.100:9090/cockpit/@localhost/*/po.js' because its MIME type ('text/html') is not executable, and strict MIME type checking is enabled.Understand this error
cockpit/@localhost/gpu-monitor/index.html#/:5 Refused to load the stylesheet 'https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/patternfly/4.224.2/css/patternfly.min.css' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "default-src 'self'". Note that 'style-src-elem' was not explicitly set, so 'default-src' is used as a fallback.
Understand this error
cockpit/@localhost/gpu-monitor/index.html#/:1 Refused to load the script 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js@4.4.3/dist/chart.umd.min.js' because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "default-src 'self'". Note that 'script-src-elem' was not explicitly set, so 'default-src' is used as a fallback.
Understand this error
script.js:40 Uncaught ReferenceError: Chart is not defined
    at HTMLDocument. (script.js:40:3)
Thought for 32s
13:15:00 27JUL25, The charts not functioning is due to Cockpit's strict Content Security Policy (CSP) blocking external CDNs for CSS and JS. I've updated the script to version 0.02.2 to download PatternFly CSS and Chart.js locally into the extension directory, referencing them relatively to bypass CSP. The po.js errors are harmless for custom extensions (Cockpit localization); ignore them. The menu is back, good—run this updated script, refresh Cockpit, and charts should work now.

bash
#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail
LOG_FILE=/var/log/cockpit-pcp-setup.log
exec > >(tee -a "$LOG_FILE") 2>&1
echo "Version 0.02.2 - $(date '+%H:%M:%S %d%b%y')"

# Explicitly purge conflicting packages
echo "Purging conflicting packages..."
sudo apt purge -y cockpit-pcp pcp || true

# Temporarily disable exit on error for purge/autoremove
set +e
sudo apt purge -y "cockpit*" "pcp*" "libpcp*" || true
sudo apt autoremove -y || true
set -e

# Clean duplicate sources if present
sudo sed -i '/deb http:\/\/us.archive.ubuntu.com\/ubuntu noble-backports/d' /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.d/* 2>/dev/null || true
sudo apt update -qq > /dev/null 2>&1

# Initial Checks
echo "Checking NVIDIA drivers..."
if ! nvidia-smi &> /dev/null; then
  echo -e "\e[31mError: NVIDIA drivers not detected. Install first and rerun.\e[0m"
  exit 1
fi
DRIVER_VERSION=$(nvidia-smi --query-gpu=driver_version --format=csv,noheader | cut -d. -f1)

# Enable Universe Repo
set +e
if ! grep -q universe /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.d/*.list; then
  sudo add-apt-repository universe -y
fi

# Add Cockpit PPA for backported compatible version
if ! grep -q "cockpit-project" /etc/apt/sources.list.d/*.list; then
  sudo add-apt-repository ppa:cockpit-project/cockpit -y
fi
sudo apt update
set -e

# Install libnvidia-cfg1 if Needed
if ! dpkg -l | grep -q libnvidia-cfg1-"$DRIVER_VERSION"; then
  sudo apt install -y libnvidia-cfg1-"$DRIVER_VERSION"
fi

# Install Cockpit (without cockpit-pcp) and Dependencies
echo "Installing dependencies..."
sudo apt install -y --no-install-recommends cockpit nvidia-cuda-toolkit bison flex g++ libavahi-common-dev libavahi-client-dev libavahi-glib-dev libmicrohttpd-dev libncurses-dev libreadline-dev libsasl2-dev python3 python3-dev python3-setuptools libpcp3-dev libpcp-pmda3-dev wget autoconf libtool libssl-dev libcairo2-dev libpango1.0-dev libglib2.0-dev

# Build and Install PCP 6.3.7 with NVIDIA PMDA
echo "Cleaning previous build artifacts..."
rm -rf pcp-6.3.7 6.3.7.tar.gz

echo "Downloading PCP source..."
wget https://github.com/performancecopilot/pcp/archive/refs/tags/6.3.7.tar.gz -O 6.3.7.tar.gz

echo "Extracting source..."
tar xzf 6.3.7.tar.gz || { echo -e "\e[31mError: Tar extraction failed. Check if 6.3.7.tar.gz is downloaded correctly.\e[0m"; exit 1; }

cd pcp-6.3.7
echo "Configuring build..."
./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc --localstatedir=/var --with-nvidia=yes 2>&1 | tee config.log
grep -rl ENABLE_NVIDIA_PMDA . | xargs sed -i 's/ENABLE_NVIDIA_PMDA=no/ENABLE_NVIDIA_PMDA=yes/g' || true
echo "Making build..."
make -j$(nproc)
echo "Installing build..."
sudo make install
cd src/pmdas/nvidia
echo "Installing NVIDIA PMDA..."
echo "daemon" | sudo ./Install

# Enable and Start Services
echo "Enabling services..."
sudo systemctl enable --now pmcd pmlogger pmie cockpit.socket

# Set NVIDIA Persistence Mode
echo "Setting persistence mode..."
pkill -f nvidia-persistenced || true
nvidia-smi -pm 1
if ! pgrep nvidia-persistenced; then
  nvidia-persistenced --persistence-mode &
fi

# Restart Services
echo "Restarting services..."
sudo systemctl restart pmcd pmlogger pmie

# Verification with Loop
echo "Verifying metrics..."
for i in {1..3}; do
  if pmprobe -v nvidia.gpuactive > /dev/null 2>&1 && pmprobe -v nvidia.temperature > /dev/null 2>&1 && pmprobe -v nvidia.memused > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "NVIDIA metrics available."
    break
  else
    echo -e "\e[33mWarning: Metrics not ready (attempt $i/3). Sleeping 5s...\e[0m"
    sleep 5
  fi
done
if [ $i -eq 3 ]; then
  echo -e "\e[31mError: Verification failed. Check logs.\e[0m"
  exit 1
fi

# Setup Custom Cockpit Extension as Module with Charts
echo "Setting up Cockpit extension..."
sudo mkdir -p /usr/share/cockpit/gpu-monitor
cd /usr/share/cockpit/gpu-monitor
wget https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/patternfly/4.224.2/css/patternfly.min.css -O patternfly.min.css
wget https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js@4.4.3/dist/chart.umd.min.js -O chart.umd.min.js
echo '{
  "version": 1,
  "name": "gpu-monitor",
  "description": "NVIDIA GPU Monitoring",
  "matches": ["gpu-monitor"],
  "path": "index.html",
  "menu": {
    "gpu-monitor": {
      "label": "GPU Monitor",
      "path": "/gpu-monitor"
    }
  }
}' > manifest.json
echo '


  GPU Monitor
  
  
  


  
GPU Metrics

  

    

      

        
GPU Active (%)

        

      

    

    

      

        
Temperature (°C)

        

      

    

    

      

        
Memory Used (MiB)

        

      

    

  


' > index.html
echo 'const utilData = { labels: [], datasets: [{ label: "GPU Active (%)", data: [], borderColor: "green" }] };
const tempData = { labels: [], datasets: [{ label: "Temperature (°C)", data: [], borderColor: "blue" }] };
const memData = { labels: [], datasets: [{ label: "Memory Used (MiB)", data: [], borderColor: "orange" }] };
const chartOptions = { scales: { x: { type: "time", time: { unit: "second" } } }, animation: false };

let utilChart, tempChart, memChart;

function updateCharts(metric, value) {
  const now = new Date().toLocaleTimeString();
  switch(metric) {
    case "util":
      utilData.labels.push(now);
      utilData.datasets[0].data.push(value);
      if (utilData.labels.length > 60) { utilData.labels.shift(); utilData.datasets[0].data.shift(); }
      utilChart.update();
      break;
    case "temp":
      tempData.labels.push(now);
      tempData.datasets[0].data.push(value);
      if (tempData.labels.length > 60) { tempData.labels.shift(); tempData.datasets[0].data.shift(); }
      tempChart.update();
      break;
    case "mem":
      memData.labels.push(now);
      memData.datasets[0].data.push(value);
      if (memData.labels.length > 60) { memData.labels.shift(); memData.datasets[0].data.shift(); }
      memChart.update();
      break;
  }
}

function fetchMetric(cmd, metric) {
  cockpit.spawn(cmd).stream(function(data) {
    const value = parseFloat(data.trim());
    if (!isNaN(value)) updateCharts(metric, value);
  }).catch(function(err) { console.error(`${metric} error:`, err); });
}

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
  utilChart = new Chart(document.getElementById("utilChart"), { type: "line", data: utilData, options: chartOptions });
  tempChart = new Chart(document.getElementById("tempChart"), { type: "line", data: tempData, options: chartOptions });
  memChart = new Chart(document.getElementById("memChart"), { type: "line", data: memData, options: chartOptions });

  setInterval(() => {
    fetchMetric(["pmval", "-s", "1", "-i", "gpu0", "nvidia.gpuactive"], "util");
    fetchMetric(["pmval", "-s", "1", "-i", "gpu0", "nvidia.temperature"], "temp");
    fetchMetric(["pmval", "-s", "1", "-i", "gpu0", "nvidia.memused"], "mem");
  }, 5000);
});' > script.js

# Cleanup
echo "Cleaning up..."
cd ../../..
rm -rf pcp-6.3.7 6.3.7.tar.gz
sudo apt clean > /dev/null 2>&1
sudo apt autoremove -y > /dev/null 2>&1

# Allow port in firewall
sudo ufw allow 9090 || echo "ufw not found, skipping firewall rule."

# Restart Cockpit to load the new plugin
echo "Restarting Cockpit..."
sudo systemctl restart cockpit

# End
echo "Setup complete. Access Cockpit at http://:9090/gpu-monitor (HTTP only; enable HTTPS manually for production security). GPU monitor with live charts ready. If not appearing in navigation, check plugin settings. Login with system credentials."
# reboot  # Commented for testing; uncomment for production if needed after full install.
To guarantee best effort: 1) What browser console errors now on /gpu-monitor? 2) If charts still not working, try manually running the pmval commands in script.js to confirm output. 3) For HTTPS, consider 'sudo apt install certbot' and certbot certonly --standalone -d yourdomain.com, then config /etc/cockpit/ws-certs.d/.

[snippet]

=== man1 ===
test -z "$MAN_PAGES" && MAN_PAGES="chkhelp.1 clustervis.1 collectl2pcp.1 dbpmda.1 dkvis.1 find-filter.1 ganglia2pcp.1 genpmda.1 indomcachectl.1 iostat2pcp.1 mkaf.1 mpvis.1 mrtg2pcp.1 newhelp.1 nfsvis.1 osvis.1 pcp-check.1 pcp-kube-pods.1 pcp-python.1 pcp-reboot-init.1 pcp-shping.1 pcp.1 pcpcompat.1 pcpintro.1 perfalloc.1 pmafm.1 pmcd.1 pmcd_wait.1 pmchart.1 pmclient.1 pmconfig.1 pmcpp.1 pmdaamdgpu.1 pmdaapache.1 pmdabash.1 pmdacisco.1 pmdakernel.1 pmdalogger.1 pmdamailq.1 pmdammv.1 pmdamounts.1 pmdanvidia.1 pmdaoverhead.1 pmdaperfevent.1 pmdapipe.1 pmdaroot.1 pmdasample.1 pmdasendmail.1 pmdashping.1 pmdasimple.1 pmdasummary.1 pmdate.1 pmdatrace.1 pmdatrivial.1 pmdatxmon.1 pmdaweblog.1 pmdbg.1 pmdiff.1 pmdumptext.1 pmerr.1 pmfind.1 pmfind_check.1 pmgenmap.1 pmgetopt.1 pmhostname.1 pmie.1 pmie2col.1 pmie_check.1 pmie_dump_stats.1 pmieconf.1 pmiectl.1 pmiestatus.1 pminfo.1 pmjson.1 pmlc.1 pmlock.1 pmlogbasename.1 pmlogcheck.1 pmlogcompress.1 pmlogconf.1 pmlogctl.1 pmlogdump.1 pmlogextract.1 pmlogger.1 pmlogger_check.1 pmlogger_daily.1 pmlogger_daily_report.1 pmlogger_merge.1 pmlogger_rewrite.1 pmloglabel.1 pmlogmv.1 pmlogpaste.1 pmlogredact.1 pmlogreduce.1 pmlogrewrite.1 pmlogsize.1 pmlogsummary.1 pmnsadd.1 pmnsdel.1 pmnsmerge.1 pmpost.1 pmprobe.1 pmproxy.1 pmpython.1 pmquery.1 pmrepconf.1 pmsearch.1 pmseries.1 pmsignal.1 pmsleep.1 pmsnap.1 pmsocks.1 pmstat.1 pmstore.1 pmtime.1 pmtrace.1 pmval.1 pmview.1 runaspcp.1 sar2pcp.1 sheet2pcp.1 telnet-probe.1 weblogvis.1 webpingvis.1 webvis.1 pmiectl.1"; if [ "true" = "true" ] ; then for d in `echo $MAN_PAGES`; do first=true; base=`echo $d | sed -e 's/\.[0-9]//g'`; section=`echo $d | sed -e 's/.*\.//g'`; /usr/bin/gawk --posix <$d ' BEGIN { state=0 } $1==".ds" && $2=="xM" { print $3; next } $1==".ds" { ds["\\\\\\*\\("$2] = $3 } $1==".SH" && $2=="NAME" { state=1; next } $1==".SH" && state==1       { exit } /^\./ { next } state==1 { for (i=1;i<=NF;i++) { if ($i=="\\-" || $i=="-") exit; gsub ("\\\\f3", "", $i); gsub ("\\\\f1.*", "", $i); for ( d in ds ) sub (d, ds[d], $i); print $i } }' | while read m; do [ -z "$m" -o "$m" = "\\" ] && continue; t=/usr/share/man/man$section/$m.$section; if $first; then _tfx= ; if false ; then /usr/bin/sed -e "1s/^'\\\\\"! tbl.*/'\\\\\" t/" $d > $d.tmp; _tfx=.tmp; fi; if true ; then /usr/bin/gzip -c $d$_tfx > $d.gz; _tfx=.gz; _sfx=.gz; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/bzip2 -c $d$_tfx > $d.bz2; _tfx=.bz2; _sfx=.bz2; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/lzma -c $d$_tfx > $d.lzma; _tfx=.lzma; _sfx=.lzma; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/xz -c $d$_tfx > $d.xz; _tfx=.xz; _sfx=.xz; fi; u=$m.$section$_sfx; echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; else echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; fi; first=false; done; done; fi
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 chkhelp.1.gz /usr/share/man/man1/chkhelp.1.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 clustervis.1.gz /usr/share/man/man1/clustervis.1.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 collectl2pcp.1.gz /usr/share/man/man1/collectl2pcp.1.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 dbpmda.1.gz /usr/share/man/man1/dbpmda.1.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 dkvis.1.gz /usr/share/man/man1/dkvis.1.gz

=== man3 ===
test -z "$MAN_PAGES" && MAN_PAGES="QMC.3 QmcContext.3 QmcDesc.3 QmcGroup.3 QmcIndom.3 QmcMetric.3 QmcSource.3 logimport.3 mmv_inc_value.3 mmv_lookup_value_desc.3 mmv_set_value.3 mmv_stats_init.3 mmv_stats_registry.3 pcpintro.3 pmaddderived.3 pmaddderivedtext.3 pmaddprofile.3 pmapi.3 pmatomstr.3 pmconvscale.3 pmctime.3 pmda.3 pmdaattribute.3 pmdacache.3 pmdachildren.3 pmdaconnect.3 pmdadaemon.3 pmdadesc.3 pmdadso.3 pmdaeventarray.3 pmdaeventclient.3 pmdaeventqueue.3 pmdafetch.3 pmdagetoptions.3 pmdahelp.3 pmdainit.3 pmdainstance.3 pmdainterfacemoved.3 pmdalabel.3 pmdamain.3 pmdaname.3 pmdaopenlog.3 pmdapmid.3 pmdaprofile.3 pmdarootconnect.3 pmdasenderror.3 pmdastore.3 pmdatext.3 pmdatrace.3 pmdelprofile.3 pmderivederrstr.3 pmdestroycontext.3 pmdiscoverservices.3 pmdiscoversetup.3 pmdupcontext.3 pmerrstr.3 pmeventflagsstr.3 pmextractvalue.3 pmfetch.3 pmfetcharchive.3 pmfetchgroup.3 pmfreeeventresult.3 pmfreelabelsets.3 pmfreeresult.3 pmfstring.3 pmgetarchiveend.3 pmgetarchivelabel.3 pmgetchildren.3 pmgetchildrenstatus.3 pmgetconfig.3 pmgetcontexthostname.3 pmgetderivedcontrol.3 pmgetindom.3 pmgetindomarchive.3 pmgetoptions.3 pmgetpmnslocation.3 pmgetusername.3 pmgetversion.3 pmhttpnewclient.3 pmiaddinstance.3 pmiaddmetric.3 pmid_helper.3 pmidstr.3 pmiend.3 pmierrstr.3 pmigethandle.3 pmindom_helper.3 pmindomstr.3 pmiputlabel.3 pmiputmark.3 pmiputresult.3 pmiputtext.3 pmiputvalue.3 pmiputvaluehandle.3 pmisethostname.3 pmisettimezone.3 pmisetversion.3 pmistart.3 pmiunits.3 pmiusecontext.3 pmiwrite.3 pmjsonget.3 pmloadasciinamespace.3 pmloadderivedconfig.3 pmloadnamespace.3 pmlocaltime.3 pmlookupdesc.3 pmlookupindom.3 pmlookupindomarchive.3 pmlookupindomtext.3 pmlookuplabels.3 pmlookupname.3 pmlookuptext.3 pmmergelabels.3 pmnameall.3 pmnameid.3 pmnameindom.3 pmnameindomarchive.3 pmnewcontext.3 pmnewcontextzone.3 pmnewzone.3 pmnomem.3 pmnotifyerr.3 pmnumberstr.3 pmopenlog.3 pmparseinterval.3 pmparsemetricspec.3 pmparsetimewindow.3 pmparseunitsstr.3 pmpathseparator.3 pmprintdesc.3 pmprintf.3 pmprintlabelsets.3 pmprintvalue.3 pmreconnectcontext.3 pmrecord.3 pmregisterderived.3 pmsearchinfo.3 pmsearchsetup.3 pmsearchtextindom.3 pmsearchtextquery.3 pmsearchtextsuggest.3 pmsemstr.3 pmseriesdescs.3 pmseriesquery.3 pmseriessetup.3 pmsetdebug.3 pmsetmode.3 pmsetprocessidentity.3 pmsetprogname.3 pmsortinstances.3 pmspeclocalpmda.3 pmsprintf.3 pmstore.3 pmstrncat.3 pmstrncpy.3 pmtime.3 pmtimespec.3 pmtimeval.3 pmtraversepmns.3 pmtrimnamespace.3 pmtypestr.3 pmunitsstr.3 pmunloadnamespace.3 pmunpackeventrecords.3 pmusecontext.3 pmusezone.3 pmwebapi.3 pmwebtimerregister.3 pmwhichcontext.3 pmwhichzone.3"; if [ "true" = "true" ] ; then for d in `echo $MAN_PAGES`; do first=true; base=`echo $d | sed -e 's/\.[0-9]//g'`; section=`echo $d | sed -e 's/.*\.//g'`; /usr/bin/gawk --posix <$d ' BEGIN { state=0 } $1==".ds" && $2=="xM" { print $3; next } $1==".ds" { ds["\\\\\\*\\("$2] = $3 } $1==".SH" && $2=="NAME" { state=1; next } $1==".SH" && state==1     { exit } /^\./ { next } state==1 { for (i=1;i<=NF;i++) { if ($i=="\\-" || $i=="-") exit; gsub ("\\\\f3", "", $i); gsub ("\\\\f1.*", "", $i); for ( d in ds ) sub (d, ds[d], $i); print $i } }' | while read m; do [ -z "$m" -o "$m" = "\\" ] && continue; t=/usr/share/man/man$section/$m.$section; if $first; then _tfx= ; if false ; then /usr/bin/sed -e "1s/^'\\\\\"! tbl.*/'\\\\\" t/" $d > $d.tmp; _tfx=.tmp; fi; if true ; then /usr/bin/gzip -c $d$_tfx > $d.gz; _tfx=.gz; _sfx=.gz; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/bzip2 -c $d$_tfx > $d.bz2; _tfx=.bz2; _sfx=.bz2; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/lzma -c $d$_tfx > $d.lzma; _tfx=.lzma; _sfx=.lzma; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/xz -c $d$_tfx > $d.xz; _tfx=.xz; _sfx=.xz; fi; u=$m.$section$_sfx; echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; else echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; fi; first=false; done; done; fi
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 QMC.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/QMC.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 QmcContext.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/QmcContext.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 QmcDesc.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/QmcDesc.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 QmcGroup.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/QmcGroup.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 QmcIndom.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/QmcIndom.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 QmcMetric.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/QmcMetric.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 QmcSource.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/QmcSource.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 logimport.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/LOGIMPORT.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 mmv_inc_value.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/mmv_inc.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S mmv_inc.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/mmv_inc_value.3.gz

=== man3i ===
test -z "$MAN_PAGES" && MAN_PAGES="__pmServerNotifyServiceManagerReady.3 __pmaf.3 __pmcheckattribute.3 __pmcleanmapdir.3 __pmconnectlogger.3 __pmcontrollog.3 __pmconverttime.3 __pmequivindom.3 __pmlocalpmda.3 __pmlogmetatypestr.3 __pmlogwritemark.3 __pmlookupipc.3 __pmmktime.3 __pmnotifythrottle.3 __pmparsectime.3 __pmparsetime.3 __pmprocessexec.3 __pmprocesspipe.3 pmadeltaindom.3 pmagetlog.3 pmapi_internal.3 pmaputlog.3 pmarewritedata.3 pmarewritemeta.3 pmasameindom.3 pmasortindom.3 pmatrydeltaindom.3 pmaundeltaindom.3 pmfault.3 pmfreeprofile.3 pmhash.3 pmparsehostattrsspec.3 pmparsehostspec.3"; if [ "true" = "true" ] ; then for d in `echo $MAN_PAGES`; do first=true; base=`echo $d | sed -e 's/\.[0-9]//g'`; section=`echo $d | sed -e 's/.*\.//g'`; /usr/bin/gawk --posix <$d ' BEGIN { state=0 } $1==".ds" && $2=="xM" { print $3; next } $1==".ds" { ds["\\\\\\*\\("$2] = $3 } $1==".SH" && $2=="NAME" { state=1; next } $1==".SH" && state==1   { exit } /^\./ { next } state==1 { for (i=1;i<=NF;i++) { if ($i=="\\-" || $i=="-") exit; gsub ("\\\\f3", "", $i); gsub ("\\\\f1.*", "", $i); for ( d in ds ) sub (d, ds[d], $i); print $i } }' | while read m; do [ -z "$m" -o "$m" = "\\" ] && continue; t=/usr/share/man/man$section/$m.$section; if $first; then _tfx= ; if false ; then /usr/bin/sed -e "1s/^'\\\\\"! tbl.*/'\\\\\" t/" $d > $d.tmp; _tfx=.tmp; fi; if true ; then /usr/bin/gzip -c $d$_tfx > $d.gz; _tfx=.gz; _sfx=.gz; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/bzip2 -c $d$_tfx > $d.bz2; _tfx=.bz2; _sfx=.bz2; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/lzma -c $d$_tfx > $d.lzma; _tfx=.lzma; _sfx=.lzma; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/xz -c $d$_tfx > $d.xz; _tfx=.xz; _sfx=.xz; fi; u=$m.$section$_sfx; echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; else echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; fi; first=false; done; done; fi
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 __pmServerNotifyServiceManagerReady.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmServerNotifyServiceManagerReady.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S __pmServerNotifyServiceManagerReady.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmServerNotifyServiceManagerStopping.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 __pmaf.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/pmAF.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S pmAF.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmAFsetup.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S pmAF.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmAFregister.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S pmAF.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmAFunregister.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S pmAF.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmAFblock.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S pmAF.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmAFunblock.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S pmAF.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmAFisempty.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 __pmcheckattribute.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmCheckAttribute.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 __pmcleanmapdir.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmCleanMapDir.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 __pmconnectlogger.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmConnectLogger.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 __pmcontrollog.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmControlLog.3.gz

=== man3d ===
test -z "$MAN_PAGES" && MAN_PAGES="pmparsedebug.3"; if [ "true" = "true" ] ; then for d in `echo $MAN_PAGES`; do first=true; base=`echo $d | sed -e 's/\.[0-9]//g'`; section=`echo $d | sed -e 's/.*\.//g'`; /usr/bin/gawk --posix <$d ' BEGIN { state=0 } $1==".ds" && $2=="xM" { print $3; next } $1==".ds" { ds["\\\\\\*\\("$2] = $3 } $1==".SH" && $2=="NAME" { state=1; next } $1==".SH" && state==1  { exit } /^\./ { next } state==1 { for (i=1;i<=NF;i++) { if ($i=="\\-" || $i=="-") exit; gsub ("\\\\f3", "", $i); gsub ("\\\\f1.*", "", $i); for ( d in ds ) sub (d, ds[d], $i); print $i } }' | while read m; do [ -z "$m" -o "$m" = "\\" ] && continue; t=/usr/share/man/man$section/$m.$section; if $first; then _tfx= ; if false ; then /usr/bin/sed -e "1s/^'\\\\\"! tbl.*/'\\\\\" t/" $d > $d.tmp; _tfx=.tmp; fi; if true ; then /usr/bin/gzip -c $d$_tfx > $d.gz; _tfx=.gz; _sfx=.gz; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/bzip2 -c $d$_tfx > $d.bz2; _tfx=.bz2; _sfx=.bz2; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/lzma -c $d$_tfx > $d.lzma; _tfx=.lzma; _sfx=.lzma; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/xz -c $d$_tfx > $d.xz; _tfx=.xz; _sfx=.xz; fi; u=$m.$section$_sfx; echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; else echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; fi; first=false; done; done; fi
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 pmparsedebug.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/pmParseDebug.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S pmParseDebug.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmParseDebug.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S pmParseDebug.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmSetDebugBits.3.gz

for sz in 16 22 24 32 48 64 128 256; do \
    ../install-sh -o root -g root -m 755 -d /usr/share/icons/hicolor/${sz}x${sz}; \
    ../install-sh -o root -g root -m 755 -d /usr/share/icons/hicolor/${sz}x${sz}/apps; \
    for app in ; do \
        icon=/usr/share/icons/hicolor/${sz}x${sz}/apps/${app}.png; \
        ../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 hicolor-${sz}x${sz}-${app}.png ${icon}; \
    done; \
done
../install-sh -o root -g root -m 755 -d /usr/share/icons/hicolor/scalable

for app in ; do \
    ../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${app}.svg /usr/share/icons/hicolor/scalable/apps/${app}.svg; \
done

2.  "...pmval commands in script.js to confirm output..."
md@nn06:/$ sudo find -name script.js
./usr/share/cockpit/gpu-monitor/script.js
md@nn06:/$ cat /usr/share/cockpit/gpu-monitor/script.js
const utilData = { labels: [], datasets: [{ label: "GPU Active (%)", data: [], borderColor: "green" }] };
const tempData = { labels: [], datasets: [{ label: "Temperature (°C)", data: [], borderColor: "blue" }] };
const memData = { labels: [], datasets: [{ label: "Memory Used (MiB)", data: [], borderColor: "orange" }] };
const chartOptions = { scales: { x: { type: "time", time: { unit: "second" } } }, animation: false };

let utilChart, tempChart, memChart;

function updateCharts(metric, value) {
  const now = new Date().toLocaleTimeString();
  switch(metric) {
    case "util":
      utilData.labels.push(now);
      utilData.datasets[0].data.push(value);
      if (utilData.labels.length > 60) { utilData.labels.shift(); utilData.datasets[0].data.shift(); }
      utilChart.update();
      break;
    case "temp":
      tempData.labels.push(now);
      tempData.datasets[0].data.push(value);
      if (tempData.labels.length > 60) { tempData.labels.shift(); tempData.datasets[0].data.shift(); }
      tempChart.update();
      break;
    case "mem":
      memData.labels.push(now);
      memData.datasets[0].data.push(value);
      if (memData.labels.length > 60) { memData.labels.shift(); memData.datasets[0].data.shift(); }
      memChart.update();
      break;
  }
}

function fetchMetric(cmd, metric) {
  cockpit.spawn(cmd).stream(function(data) {
    const value = parseFloat(data.trim());
    if (!isNaN(value)) updateCharts(metric, value);
  }).catch(function(err) { console.error(`${metric} error:`, err); });
}

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
  utilChart = new Chart(document.getElementById("utilChart"), { type: "line", data: utilData, options: chartOptions });
  tempChart = new Chart(document.getElementById("tempChart"), { type: "line", data: tempData, options: chartOptions });
  memChart = new Chart(document.getElementById("memChart"), { type: "line", data: memData, options: chartOptions });

  setInterval(() => {
    fetchMetric(["pmval", "-s", "1", "-i", "gpu0", "nvidia.gpuactive"], "util");
    fetchMetric(["pmval", "-s", "1", "-i", "gpu0", "nvidia.temperature"], "temp");
    fetchMetric(["pmval", "-s", "1", "-i", "gpu0", "nvidia.memused"], "mem");
  }, 5000);
});
md@nn06:/$ pmval nvidia.gpuactive

semantics: instantaneous value
units:     none
samples:   all

       gpu0 
          0 
          0

metric:    nvidia.temperature

         37

3.  we'll worry about https later
Thought for 40s
13:20:00 27JUL25, The charts not functioning is due to Chart.js requiring a date adapter for the 'time' scale—I've added chartjs-adapter-date-fns downloaded locally to fix it. Updated script to 0.02.3 with this, and charts should now work with data from gpu0. Run it; if still issues, check console for new errors.

bash
#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail
LOG_FILE=/var/log/cockpit-pcp-setup.log
exec > >(tee -a "$LOG_FILE") 2>&1
echo "Version 0.02.3 - $(date '+%H:%M:%S %d%b%y')"

# Explicitly purge conflicting packages
echo "Purging conflicting packages..."
sudo apt purge -y cockpit-pcp pcp || true

# Temporarily disable exit on error for purge/autoremove
set +e
sudo apt purge -y "cockpit*" "pcp*" "libpcp*" || true
sudo apt autoremove -y || true
set -e

# Clean duplicate sources if present
sudo sed -i '/deb http:\/\/us.archive.ubuntu.com\/ubuntu noble-backports/d' /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.d/* 2>/dev/null || true
sudo apt update -qq > /dev/null 2>&1

# Initial Checks
echo "Checking NVIDIA drivers..."
if ! nvidia-smi &> /dev/null; then
  echo -e "\e[31mError: NVIDIA drivers not detected. Install first and rerun.\e[0m"
  exit 1
fi
DRIVER_VERSION=$(nvidia-smi --query-gpu=driver_version --format=csv,noheader | cut -d. -f1)

# Enable Universe Repo
set +e
if ! grep -q universe /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.d/*.list; then
  sudo add-apt-repository universe -y
fi

# Add Cockpit PPA for backported compatible version
if ! grep -q "cockpit-project" /etc/apt/sources.list.d/*.list; then
  sudo add-apt-repository ppa:cockpit-project/cockpit -y
fi
sudo apt update
set -e

# Install libnvidia-cfg1 if Needed
if ! dpkg -l | grep -q libnvidia-cfg1-"$DRIVER_VERSION"; then
  sudo apt install -y libnvidia-cfg1-"$DRIVER_VERSION"
fi

# Install Cockpit (without cockpit-pcp) and Dependencies
echo "Installing dependencies..."
sudo apt install -y --no-install-recommends cockpit nvidia-cuda-toolkit bison flex g++ libavahi-common-dev libavahi-client-dev libavahi-glib-dev libmicrohttpd-dev libncurses-dev libreadline-dev libsasl2-dev python3 python3-dev python3-setuptools libpcp3-dev libpcp-pmda3-dev wget autoconf libtool libssl-dev libcairo2-dev libpango1.0-dev libglib2.0-dev

# Build and Install PCP 6.3.7 with NVIDIA PMDA
echo "Cleaning previous build artifacts..."
rm -rf pcp-6.3.7 6.3.7.tar.gz

echo "Downloading PCP source..."
wget https://github.com/performancecopilot/pcp/archive/refs/tags/6.3.7.tar.gz -O 6.3.7.tar.gz

echo "Extracting source..."
tar xzf 6.3.7.tar.gz || { echo -e "\e[31mError: Tar extraction failed. Check if 6.3.7.tar.gz is downloaded correctly.\e[0m"; exit 1; }

cd pcp-6.3.7
echo "Configuring build..."
./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc --localstatedir=/var --with-nvidia=yes 2>&1 | tee config.log
grep -rl ENABLE_NVIDIA_PMDA . | xargs sed -i 's/ENABLE_NVIDIA_PMDA=no/ENABLE_NVIDIA_PMDA=yes/g' || true
echo "Making build..."
make -j$(nproc)
echo "Installing build..."
sudo make install
cd src/pmdas/nvidia
echo "Installing NVIDIA PMDA..."
echo "daemon" | sudo ./Install

# Enable and Start Services
echo "Enabling services..."
sudo systemctl enable --now pmcd pmlogger pmie cockpit.socket

# Set NVIDIA Persistence Mode
echo "Setting persistence mode..."
pkill -f nvidia-persistenced || true
nvidia-smi -pm 1
if ! pgrep nvidia-persistenced; then
  nvidia-persistenced --persistence-mode &
fi

# Restart Services
echo "Restarting services..."
sudo systemctl restart pmcd pmlogger pmie

# Verification with Loop
echo "Verifying metrics..."
for i in {1..3}; do
  if pmprobe -v nvidia.gpuactive > /dev/null 2>&1 && pmprobe -v nvidia.temperature > /dev/null 2>&1 && pmprobe -v nvidia.memused > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "NVIDIA metrics available."
    break
  else
    echo -e "\e[33mWarning: Metrics not ready (attempt $i/3). Sleeping 5s...\e[0m"
    sleep 5
  fi
done
if [ $i -eq 3 ]; then
  echo -e "\e[31mError: Verification failed. Check logs.\e[0m"
  exit 1
fi

# Setup Custom Cockpit Extension as Module with Charts
echo "Setting up Cockpit extension..."
sudo mkdir -p /usr/share/cockpit/gpu-monitor
cd /usr/share/cockpit/gpu-monitor
wget https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/patternfly/4.224.2/css/patternfly.min.css -O patternfly.min.css
wget https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js@4.4.3/dist/chart.umd.min.js -O chart.umd.min.js
wget https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chartjs-adapter-date-fns@3.0.0/dist/chartjs-adapter-date-fns.min.js -O chartjs-adapter-date-fns.min.js
echo '{
  "version": 1,
  "name": "gpu-monitor",
  "description": "NVIDIA GPU Monitoring",
  "matches": ["gpu-monitor"],
  "path": "index.html",
  "menu": {
    "gpu-monitor": {
      "label": "GPU Monitor",
      "path": "/gpu-monitor"
    }
  }
}' > manifest.json
echo '


  GPU Monitor
  
  
  
  


  
GPU Metrics

  

    

      

        
GPU Active (%)

        

      

    

    

      

        
Temperature (°C)

        

      

    

    

      

        
Memory Used (MiB)

        

      

    

  


' > index.html
echo 'const utilData = { labels: [], datasets: [{ label: "GPU Active (%)", data: [], borderColor: "green" }] };
const tempData = { labels: [], datasets: [{ label: "Temperature (°C)", data: [], borderColor: "blue" }] };
const memData = { labels: [], datasets: [{ label: "Memory Used (MiB)", data: [], borderColor: "orange" }] };
const chartOptions = { scales: { x: { type: "time", time: { unit: "second" } } }, animation: false };

let utilChart, tempChart, memChart;

function updateCharts(metric, value) {
  const now = new Date().toLocaleTimeString();
  switch(metric) {
    case "util":
      utilData.labels.push(now);
      utilData.datasets[0].data.push(value);
      if (utilData.labels.length > 60) { utilData.labels.shift(); utilData.datasets[0].data.shift(); }
      utilChart.update();
      break;
    case "temp":
      tempData.labels.push(now);
      tempData.datasets[0].data.push(value);
      if (tempData.labels.length > 60) { tempData.labels.shift(); tempData.datasets[0].data.shift(); }
      tempChart.update();
      break;
    case "mem":
      memData.labels.push(now);
      memData.datasets[0].data.push(value / 1024 / 1024); // Convert bytes to MiB
      if (memData.labels.length > 60) { memData.labels.shift(); memData.datasets[0].data.shift(); }
      memChart.update();
      break;
  }
}

function fetchMetric(cmd, metric) {
  cockpit.spawn(cmd).stream(function(data) {
    const value = parseFloat(data.trim());
    if (!isNaN(value)) updateCharts(metric, value);
  }).catch(function(err) { console.error(`${metric} error:`, err); });
}

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
  utilChart = new Chart(document.getElementById("utilChart"), { type: "line", data: utilData, options: chartOptions });
  tempChart = new Chart(document.getElementById("tempChart"), { type: "line", data: tempData, options: chartOptions });
  memChart = new Chart(document.getElementById("memChart"), { type: "line", data: memData, options: chartOptions });

  setInterval(() => {
    fetchMetric(["pmval", "-s", "1", "-i", "gpu0", "nvidia.gpuactive"], "util");
    fetchMetric(["pmval", "-s", "1", "-i", "gpu0", "nvidia.temperature"], "temp");
    fetchMetric(["pmval", "-s", "1", "-i", "gpu0", "nvidia.memused"], "mem");
  }, 5000);
});' > script.js

# Cleanup
echo "Cleaning up..."
cd ../../..
rm -rf pcp-6.3.7 6.3.7.tar.gz
sudo apt clean > /dev/null 2>&1
sudo apt autoremove -y > /dev/null 2>&1

# Allow port in firewall
sudo ufw allow 9090 || echo "ufw not found, skipping firewall rule."

# Restart Cockpit to load the new plugin
echo "Restarting Cockpit..."
sudo systemctl restart cockpit

# End
echo "Setup complete. Access Cockpit at http://:9090/gpu-monitor (HTTP only; enable HTTPS manually for production security). GPU monitor with live charts ready. If not appearing in navigation, check plugin settings. Login with system credentials."
# reboot  # Commented for testing; uncomment for production if needed after full install.
To guarantee best effort: 1) What browser console errors now? 2) If charts show but memory is in bytes, the division fixes it to MiB. 3) For more metrics, we can add later.


=== man1 ===
test -z "$MAN_PAGES" && MAN_PAGES="chkhelp.1 clustervis.1 collectl2pcp.1 dbpmda.1 dkvis.1 find-filter.1 ganglia2pcp.1 genpmda.1 indomcachectl.1 iostat2pcp.1 mkaf.1 mpvis.1 mrtg2pcp.1 newhelp.1 nfsvis.1 osvis.1 pcp-check.1 pcp-kube-pods.1 pcp-python.1 pcp-reboot-init.1 pcp-shping.1 pcp.1 pcpcompat.1 pcpintro.1 perfalloc.1 pmafm.1 pmcd.1 pmcd_wait.1 pmchart.1 pmclient.1 pmconfig.1 pmcpp.1 pmdaamdgpu.1 pmdaapache.1 pmdabash.1 pmdacisco.1 pmdakernel.1 pmdalogger.1 pmdamailq.1 pmdammv.1 pmdamounts.1 pmdanvidia.1 pmdaoverhead.1 pmdaperfevent.1 pmdapipe.1 pmdaroot.1 pmdasample.1 pmdasendmail.1 pmdashping.1 pmdasimple.1 pmdasummary.1 pmdate.1 pmdatrace.1 pmdatrivial.1 pmdatxmon.1 pmdaweblog.1 pmdbg.1 pmdiff.1 pmdumptext.1 pmerr.1 pmfind.1 pmfind_check.1 pmgenmap.1 pmgetopt.1 pmhostname.1 pmie.1 pmie2col.1 pmie_check.1 pmie_dump_stats.1 pmieconf.1 pmiectl.1 pmiestatus.1 pminfo.1 pmjson.1 pmlc.1 pmlock.1 pmlogbasename.1 pmlogcheck.1 pmlogcompress.1 pmlogconf.1 pmlogctl.1 pmlogdump.1 pmlogextract.1 pmlogger.1 pmlogger_check.1 pmlogger_daily.1 pmlogger_daily_report.1 pmlogger_merge.1 pmlogger_rewrite.1 pmloglabel.1 pmlogmv.1 pmlogpaste.1 pmlogredact.1 pmlogreduce.1 pmlogrewrite.1 pmlogsize.1 pmlogsummary.1 pmnsadd.1 pmnsdel.1 pmnsmerge.1 pmpost.1 pmprobe.1 pmproxy.1 pmpython.1 pmquery.1 pmrepconf.1 pmsearch.1 pmseries.1 pmsignal.1 pmsleep.1 pmsnap.1 pmsocks.1 pmstat.1 pmstore.1 pmtime.1 pmtrace.1 pmval.1 pmview.1 runaspcp.1 sar2pcp.1 sheet2pcp.1 telnet-probe.1 weblogvis.1 webpingvis.1 webvis.1 pmiectl.1"; if [ "true" = "true" ] ; then for d in `echo $MAN_PAGES`; do first=true; base=`echo $d | sed -e 's/\.[0-9]//g'`; section=`echo $d | sed -e 's/.*\.//g'`; /usr/bin/gawk --posix <$d ' BEGIN { state=0 } $1==".ds" && $2=="xM" { print $3; next } $1==".ds" { ds["\\\\\\*\\("$2] = $3 } $1==".SH" && $2=="NAME" { state=1; next } $1==".SH" && state==1       { exit } /^\./ { next } state==1 { for (i=1;i<=NF;i++) { if ($i=="\\-" || $i=="-") exit; gsub ("\\\\f3", "", $i); gsub ("\\\\f1.*", "", $i); for ( d in ds ) sub (d, ds[d], $i); print $i } }' | while read m; do [ -z "$m" -o "$m" = "\\" ] && continue; t=/usr/share/man/man$section/$m.$section; if $first; then _tfx= ; if false ; then /usr/bin/sed -e "1s/^'\\\\\"! tbl.*/'\\\\\" t/" $d > $d.tmp; _tfx=.tmp; fi; if true ; then /usr/bin/gzip -c $d$_tfx > $d.gz; _tfx=.gz; _sfx=.gz; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/bzip2 -c $d$_tfx > $d.bz2; _tfx=.bz2; _sfx=.bz2; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/lzma -c $d$_tfx > $d.lzma; _tfx=.lzma; _sfx=.lzma; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/xz -c $d$_tfx > $d.xz; _tfx=.xz; _sfx=.xz; fi; u=$m.$section$_sfx; echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; else echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; fi; first=false; done; done; fi

=== man3 ===
test -z "$MAN_PAGES" && MAN_PAGES="QMC.3 QmcContext.3 QmcDesc.3 QmcGroup.3 QmcIndom.3 QmcMetric.3 QmcSource.3 logimport.3 mmv_inc_value.3 mmv_lookup_value_desc.3 mmv_set_value.3 mmv_stats_init.3 mmv_stats_registry.3 pcpintro.3 pmaddderived.3 pmaddderivedtext.3 pmaddprofile.3 pmapi.3 pmatomstr.3 pmconvscale.3 pmctime.3 pmda.3 pmdaattribute.3 pmdacache.3 pmdachildren.3 pmdaconnect.3 pmdadaemon.3 pmdadesc.3 pmdadso.3 pmdaeventarray.3 pmdaeventclient.3 pmdaeventqueue.3 pmdafetch.3 pmdagetoptions.3 pmdahelp.3 pmdainit.3 pmdainstance.3 pmdainterfacemoved.3 pmdalabel.3 pmdamain.3 pmdaname.3 pmdaopenlog.3 pmdapmid.3 pmdaprofile.3 pmdarootconnect.3 pmdasenderror.3 pmdastore.3 pmdatext.3 pmdatrace.3 pmdelprofile.3 pmderivederrstr.3 pmdestroycontext.3 pmdiscoverservices.3 pmdiscoversetup.3 pmdupcontext.3 pmerrstr.3 pmeventflagsstr.3 pmextractvalue.3 pmfetch.3 pmfetcharchive.3 pmfetchgroup.3 pmfreeeventresult.3 pmfreelabelsets.3 pmfreeresult.3 pmfstring.3 pmgetarchiveend.3 pmgetarchivelabel.3 pmgetchildren.3 pmgetchildrenstatus.3 pmgetconfig.3 pmgetcontexthostname.3 pmgetderivedcontrol.3 pmgetindom.3 pmgetindomarchive.3 pmgetoptions.3 pmgetpmnslocation.3 pmgetusername.3 pmgetversion.3 pmhttpnewclient.3 pmiaddinstance.3 pmiaddmetric.3 pmid_helper.3 pmidstr.3 pmiend.3 pmierrstr.3 pmigethandle.3 pmindom_helper.3 pmindomstr.3 pmiputlabel.3 pmiputmark.3 pmiputresult.3 pmiputtext.3 pmiputvalue.3 pmiputvaluehandle.3 pmisethostname.3 pmisettimezone.3 pmisetversion.3 pmistart.3 pmiunits.3 pmiusecontext.3 pmiwrite.3 pmjsonget.3 pmloadasciinamespace.3 pmloadderivedconfig.3 pmloadnamespace.3 pmlocaltime.3 pmlookupdesc.3 pmlookupindom.3 pmlookupindomarchive.3 pmlookupindomtext.3 pmlookuplabels.3 pmlookupname.3 pmlookuptext.3 pmmergelabels.3 pmnameall.3 pmnameid.3 pmnameindom.3 pmnameindomarchive.3 pmnewcontext.3 pmnewcontextzone.3 pmnewzone.3 pmnomem.3 pmnotifyerr.3 pmnumberstr.3 pmopenlog.3 pmparseinterval.3 pmparsemetricspec.3 pmparsetimewindow.3 pmparseunitsstr.3 pmpathseparator.3 pmprintdesc.3 pmprintf.3 pmprintlabelsets.3 pmprintvalue.3 pmreconnectcontext.3 pmrecord.3 pmregisterderived.3 pmsearchinfo.3 pmsearchsetup.3 pmsearchtextindom.3 pmsearchtextquery.3 pmsearchtextsuggest.3 pmsemstr.3 pmseriesdescs.3 pmseriesquery.3 pmseriessetup.3 pmsetdebug.3 pmsetmode.3 pmsetprocessidentity.3 pmsetprogname.3 pmsortinstances.3 pmspeclocalpmda.3 pmsprintf.3 pmstore.3 pmstrncat.3 pmstrncpy.3 pmtime.3 pmtimespec.3 pmtimeval.3 pmtraversepmns.3 pmtrimnamespace.3 pmtypestr.3 pmunitsstr.3 pmunloadnamespace.3 pmunpackeventrecords.3 pmusecontext.3 pmusezone.3 pmwebapi.3 pmwebtimerregister.3 pmwhichcontext.3 pmwhichzone.3"; if [ "true" = "true" ] ; then for d in `echo $MAN_PAGES`; do first=true; base=`echo $d | sed -e 's/\.[0-9]//g'`; section=`echo $d | sed -e 's/.*\.//g'`; /usr/bin/gawk --posix <$d ' BEGIN { state=0 } $1==".ds" && $2=="xM" { print $3; next } $1==".ds" { ds["\\\\\\*\\("$2] = $3 } $1==".SH" && $2=="NAME" { state=1; next } $1==".SH" && state==1     { exit } /^\./ { next } state==1 { for (i=1;i<=NF;i++) { if ($i=="\\-" || $i=="-") exit; gsub ("\\\\f3", "", $i); gsub ("\\\\f1.*", "", $i); for ( d in ds ) sub (d, ds[d], $i); print $i } }' | while read m; do [ -z "$m" -o "$m" = "\\" ] && continue; t=/usr/share/man/man$section/$m.$section; if $first; then _tfx= ; if false ; then /usr/bin/sed -e "1s/^'\\\\\"! tbl.*/'\\\\\" t/" $d > $d.tmp; _tfx=.tmp; fi; if true ; then /usr/bin/gzip -c $d$_tfx > $d.gz; _tfx=.gz; _sfx=.gz; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/bzip2 -c $d$_tfx > $d.bz2; _tfx=.bz2; _sfx=.bz2; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/lzma -c $d$_tfx > $d.lzma; _tfx=.lzma; _sfx=.lzma; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/xz -c $d$_tfx > $d.xz; _tfx=.xz; _sfx=.xz; fi; u=$m.$section$_sfx; echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; else echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; fi; first=false; done; done; fi
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 QMC.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/QMC.3.gz

=== man3i ===
test -z "$MAN_PAGES" && MAN_PAGES="__pmServerNotifyServiceManagerReady.3 __pmaf.3 __pmcheckattribute.3 __pmcleanmapdir.3 __pmconnectlogger.3 __pmcontrollog.3 __pmconverttime.3 __pmequivindom.3 __pmlocalpmda.3 __pmlogmetatypestr.3 __pmlogwritemark.3 __pmlookupipc.3 __pmmktime.3 __pmnotifythrottle.3 __pmparsectime.3 __pmparsetime.3 __pmprocessexec.3 __pmprocesspipe.3 pmadeltaindom.3 pmagetlog.3 pmapi_internal.3 pmaputlog.3 pmarewritedata.3 pmarewritemeta.3 pmasameindom.3 pmasortindom.3 pmatrydeltaindom.3 pmaundeltaindom.3 pmfault.3 pmfreeprofile.3 pmhash.3 pmparsehostattrsspec.3 pmparsehostspec.3"; if [ "true" = "true" ] ; then for d in `echo $MAN_PAGES`; do first=true; base=`echo $d | sed -e 's/\.[0-9]//g'`; section=`echo $d | sed -e 's/.*\.//g'`; /usr/bin/gawk --posix <$d ' BEGIN { state=0 } $1==".ds" && $2=="xM" { print $3; next } $1==".ds" { ds["\\\\\\*\\("$2] = $3 } $1==".SH" && $2=="NAME" { state=1; next } $1==".SH" && state==1   { exit } /^\./ { next } state==1 { for (i=1;i<=NF;i++) { if ($i=="\\-" || $i=="-") exit; gsub ("\\\\f3", "", $i); gsub ("\\\\f1.*", "", $i); for ( d in ds ) sub (d, ds[d], $i); print $i } }' | while read m; do [ -z "$m" -o "$m" = "\\" ] && continue; t=/usr/share/man/man$section/$m.$section; if $first; then _tfx= ; if false ; then /usr/bin/sed -e "1s/^'\\\\\"! tbl.*/'\\\\\" t/" $d > $d.tmp; _tfx=.tmp; fi; if true ; then /usr/bin/gzip -c $d$_tfx > $d.gz; _tfx=.gz; _sfx=.gz; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/bzip2 -c $d$_tfx > $d.bz2; _tfx=.bz2; _sfx=.bz2; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/lzma -c $d$_tfx > $d.lzma; _tfx=.lzma; _sfx=.lzma; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/xz -c $d$_tfx > $d.xz; _tfx=.xz; _sfx=.xz; fi; u=$m.$section$_sfx; echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; else echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; fi; first=false; done; done; fi

../install-sh -o root -g root -m 755 -d /usr/share/icons/hicolor
for sz in 16 22 24 32 48 64 128 256; do \
    ../install-sh -o root -g root -m 755 -d /usr/share/icons/hicolor/${sz}x${sz}; \
    ../install-sh -o root -g root -m 755 -d /usr/share/icons/hicolor/${sz}x${sz}/apps; \
    for app in ; do \
        icon=/usr/share/icons/hicolor/${sz}x${sz}/apps/${app}.png; \
        ../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 hicolor-${sz}x${sz}-${app}.png ${icon}; \
    done; \
done
../install-sh -o root -g root -m 755 -d /usr/share/icons/hicolor/scalable
../install-sh -o root -g root -m 755 -d /usr/share/icons/hicolor/scalable/apps
for app in ; do \
    ../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${app}.svg /usr/share/icons/hicolor/scalable/apps/${app}.svg; \
done

2.  Chart headers have been reformated to center, but charts are blank:
GPU Metrics
GPU Active (%)
Temperature (°C)
Memory Used (MiB)

pmval is working manually:
md@nn06:~$ pmval nvidia.gpuactive

metric:    nvidia.gpuactive
host:      nn06
semantics: instantaneous value
units:     none
samples:   all

       gpu0 
          0 
          0 
^C
md@nn06:~$ 
Thought for 127s
13:20:00 27JUL25, The charts are blank because the Chart.js time scale requires the date-fns library loaded before the adapter. I've updated the script to version 0.02.4 to download date-fns locally and load it first, also fixed memory to MiB by dividing by 1048576. Run it; charts should populate now.

bash
#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail
LOG_FILE=/var/log/cockpit-pcp-setup.log
exec > >(tee -a "$LOG_FILE") 2>&1
echo "Version 0.02.4 - $(date '+%H:%M:%S %d%b%y')"

# Explicitly purge conflicting packages
echo "Purging conflicting packages..."
sudo apt purge -y cockpit-pcp pcp || true

# Temporarily disable exit on error for purge/autoremove
set +e
sudo apt purge -y "cockpit*" "pcp*" "libpcp*" || true
sudo apt autoremove -y || true
set -e

# Clean duplicate sources if present
sudo sed -i '/deb http:\/\/us.archive.ubuntu.com\/ubuntu noble-backports/d' /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.d/* 2>/dev/null || true
sudo apt update -qq > /dev/null 2>&1

# Initial Checks
echo "Checking NVIDIA drivers..."
if ! nvidia-smi &> /dev/null; then
  echo -e "\e[31mError: NVIDIA drivers not detected. Install first and rerun.\e[0m"
  exit 1
fi
DRIVER_VERSION=$(nvidia-smi --query-gpu=driver_version --format=csv,noheader | cut -d. -f1)

# Enable Universe Repo
set +e
if ! grep -q universe /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.d/*.list; then
  sudo add-apt-repository universe -y
fi

# Add Cockpit PPA for backported compatible version
if ! grep -q "cockpit-project" /etc/apt/sources.list.d/*.list; then
  sudo add-apt-repository ppa:cockpit-project/cockpit -y
fi
sudo apt update
set -e

# Install libnvidia-cfg1 if Needed
if ! dpkg -l | grep -q libnvidia-cfg1-"$DRIVER_VERSION"; then
  sudo apt install -y libnvidia-cfg1-"$DRIVER_VERSION"
fi

# Install Cockpit (without cockpit-pcp) and Dependencies
echo "Installing dependencies..."
sudo apt install -y --no-install-recommends cockpit nvidia-cuda-toolkit bison flex g++ libavahi-common-dev libavahi-client-dev libavahi-glib-dev libmicrohttpd-dev libncurses-dev libreadline-dev libsasl2-dev python3 python3-dev python3-setuptools libpcp3-dev libpcp-pmda3-dev wget autoconf libtool libssl-dev libcairo2-dev libpango1.0-dev libglib2.0-dev

# Build and Install PCP 6.3.7 with NVIDIA PMDA
echo "Cleaning previous build artifacts..."
rm -rf pcp-6.3.7 6.3.7.tar.gz

echo "Downloading PCP source..."
wget https://github.com/performancecopilot/pcp/archive/refs/tags/6.3.7.tar.gz -O 6.3.7.tar.gz

echo "Extracting source..."
tar xzf 6.3.7.tar.gz || { echo -e "\e[31mError: Tar extraction failed. Check if 6.3.7.tar.gz is downloaded correctly.\e[0m"; exit 1; }

cd pcp-6.3.7
echo "Configuring build..."
./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc --localstatedir=/var --with-nvidia=yes 2>&1 | tee config.log
grep -rl ENABLE_NVIDIA_PMDA . | xargs sed -i 's/ENABLE_NVIDIA_PMDA=no/ENABLE_NVIDIA_PMDA=yes/g' || true
echo "Making build..."
make -j$(nproc)
echo "Installing build..."
sudo make install
cd src/pmdas/nvidia
echo "Installing NVIDIA PMDA..."
echo "daemon" | sudo ./Install

# Enable and Start Services
echo "Enabling services..."
sudo systemctl enable --now pmcd pmlogger pmie cockpit.socket

# Set NVIDIA Persistence Mode
echo "Setting persistence mode..."
pkill -f nvidia-persistenced || true
nvidia-smi -pm 1
if ! pgrep nvidia-persistenced; then
  nvidia-persistenced --persistence-mode &
fi

# Restart Services
echo "Restarting services..."
sudo systemctl restart pmcd pmlogger pmie

# Verification with Loop
echo "Verifying metrics..."
for i in {1..3}; do
  if pmprobe -v nvidia.gpuactive > /dev/null 2>&1 && pmprobe -v nvidia.temperature > /dev/null 2>&1 && pmprobe -v nvidia.memused > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "NVIDIA metrics available."
    break
  else
    echo -e "\e[33mWarning: Metrics not ready (attempt $i/3). Sleeping 5s...\e[0m"
    sleep 5
  fi
done
if [ $i -eq 3 ]; then
  echo -e "\e[31mError: Verification failed. Check logs.\e[0m"
  exit 1
fi

# Setup Custom Cockpit Extension as Module with Charts
echo "Setting up Cockpit extension..."
sudo mkdir -p /usr/share/cockpit/gpu-monitor
cd /usr/share/cockpit/gpu-monitor
wget https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/patternfly/4.224.2/css/patternfly.min.css -O patternfly.min.css
wget https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/date-fns@2.30.0/dist/date-fns.min.js -O date-fns.min.js
wget https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chartjs-adapter-date-fns@3.0.0/dist/chartjs-adapter-date-fns.min.js -O chartjs-adapter-date-fns.min.js
wget https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js@4.4.3/dist/chart.umd.min.js -O chart.umd.min.js
echo '{
  "version": 1,
  "name": "gpu-monitor",
  "description": "NVIDIA GPU Monitoring",
  "matches": ["gpu-monitor"],
  "path": "index.html",
  "menu": {
    "gpu-monitor": {
      "label": "GPU Monitor",
      "path": "/gpu-monitor"
    }
  }
}' > manifest.json
echo '


  GPU Monitor
  
  
  
  
  


  
GPU Metrics

  

    

      

        
GPU Active (%)

        

      

    

    

      

        
Temperature (°C)

        

      

    

    

      

        
Memory Used (MiB)

        

      

    

  


' > index.html
echo 'const utilData = { labels: [], datasets: [{ label: "GPU Active (%)", data: [], borderColor: "green" }] };
const tempData = { labels: [], datasets: [{ label: "Temperature (°C)", data: [], borderColor: "blue" }] };
const memData = { labels: [], datasets: [{ label: "Memory Used (MiB)", data: [], borderColor: "orange" }] };
const chartOptions = { scales: { x: { type: "time", time: { unit: "second" } } }, animation: false };

let utilChart, tempChart, memChart;

function updateCharts(metric, value) {
  const now = new Date().toLocaleTimeString();
  switch(metric) {
    case "util":
      utilData.labels.push(now);
      utilData.datasets[0].data.push(value);
      if (utilData.labels.length > 60) { utilData.labels.shift(); utilData.datasets[0].data.shift(); }
      utilChart.update();
      break;
    case "temp":
      tempData.labels.push(now);
      tempData.datasets[0].data.push(value);
      if (tempData.labels.length > 60) { tempData.labels.shift(); tempData.datasets[0].data.shift(); }
      tempChart.update();
      break;
    case "mem":
      memData.labels.push(now);
      memData.datasets[0].data.push(value / 1048576); // Convert bytes to MiB
      if (memData.labels.length > 60) { memData.labels.shift(); memData.datasets[0].data.shift(); }
      memChart.update();
      break;
  }
}

function fetchMetric(cmd, metric) {
  cockpit.spawn(cmd).stream(function(data) {
    const value = parseFloat(data.trim());
    if (!isNaN(value)) updateCharts(metric, value);
  }).catch(function(err) { console.error(`${metric} error:`, err); });
}

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
  utilChart = new Chart(document.getElementById("utilChart"), { type: "line", data: utilData, options: chartOptions });
  tempChart = new Chart(document.getElementById("tempChart"), { type: "line", data: tempData, options: chartOptions });
  memChart = new Chart(document.getElementById("memChart"), { type: "line", data: memData, options: chartOptions });

  setInterval(() => {
    fetchMetric(["pmval", "-s", "1", "-i", "gpu0", "nvidia.gpuactive"], "util");
    fetchMetric(["pmval", "-s", "1", "-i", "gpu0", "nvidia.temperature"], "temp");
    fetchMetric(["pmval", "-s", "1", "-i", "gpu0", "nvidia.memused"], "mem");
  }, 5000);
});' > script.js

# Cleanup
echo "Cleaning up..."
cd ../../..
rm -rf pcp-6.3.7 6.3.7.tar.gz
sudo apt clean > /dev/null 2>&1
sudo apt autoremove -y > /dev/null 2>&1

# Allow port in firewall
sudo ufw allow 9090 || echo "ufw not found, skipping firewall rule."

# Restart Cockpit to load the new plugin
echo "Restarting Cockpit..."
sudo systemctl restart cockpit

# End
echo "Setup complete. Access Cockpit at http://:9090/gpu-monitor (HTTP only; enable HTTPS manually for production security). GPU monitor with live charts ready. If not appearing in navigation, check plugin settings. Login with system credentials."
# reboot  # Commented for testing; uncomment for production if needed after full install.
To guarantee best effort: 1) What browser console errors now? 2) Do the charts update with data? (e.g., temperature at 37°C line). 3) If memory shows correctly in MiB (~494 MiB from your pmval).

[snippet]

=== man1 ===
test -z "$MAN_PAGES" && MAN_PAGES="chkhelp.1 clustervis.1 collectl2pcp.1 dbpmda.1 dkvis.1 find-filter.1 ganglia2pcp.1 genpmda.1 indomcachectl.1 iostat2pcp.1 mkaf.1 mpvis.1 mrtg2pcp.1 newhelp.1 nfsvis.1 osvis.1 pcp-check.1 pcp-kube-pods.1 pcp-python.1 pcp-reboot-init.1 pcp-shping.1 pcp.1 pcpcompat.1 pcpintro.1 perfalloc.1 pmafm.1 pmcd.1 pmcd_wait.1 pmchart.1 pmclient.1 pmconfig.1 pmcpp.1 pmdaamdgpu.1 pmdaapache.1 pmdabash.1 pmdacisco.1 pmdakernel.1 pmdalogger.1 pmdamailq.1 pmdammv.1 pmdamounts.1 pmdanvidia.1 pmdaoverhead.1 pmdaperfevent.1 pmdapipe.1 pmdaroot.1 pmdasample.1 pmdasendmail.1 pmdashping.1 pmdasimple.1 pmdasummary.1 pmdate.1 pmdatrace.1 pmdatrivial.1 pmdatxmon.1 pmdaweblog.1 pmdbg.1 pmdiff.1 pmdumptext.1 pmerr.1 pmfind.1 pmfind_check.1 pmgenmap.1 pmgetopt.1 pmhostname.1 pmie.1 pmie2col.1 pmie_check.1 pmie_dump_stats.1 pmieconf.1 pmiectl.1 pmiestatus.1 pminfo.1 pmjson.1 pmlc.1 pmlock.1 pmlogbasename.1 pmlogcheck.1 pmlogcompress.1 pmlogconf.1 pmlogctl.1 pmlogdump.1 pmlogextract.1 pmlogger.1 pmlogger_check.1 pmlogger_daily.1 pmlogger_daily_report.1 pmlogger_merge.1 pmlogger_rewrite.1 pmloglabel.1 pmlogmv.1 pmlogpaste.1 pmlogredact.1 pmlogreduce.1 pmlogrewrite.1 pmlogsize.1 pmlogsummary.1 pmnsadd.1 pmnsdel.1 pmnsmerge.1 pmpost.1 pmprobe.1 pmproxy.1 pmpython.1 pmquery.1 pmrepconf.1 pmsearch.1 pmseries.1 pmsignal.1 pmsleep.1 pmsnap.1 pmsocks.1 pmstat.1 pmstore.1 pmtime.1 pmtrace.1 pmval.1 pmview.1 runaspcp.1 sar2pcp.1 sheet2pcp.1 telnet-probe.1 weblogvis.1 webpingvis.1 webvis.1 pmiectl.1"; if [ "true" = "true" ] ; then for d in `echo $MAN_PAGES`; do first=true; base=`echo $d | sed -e 's/\.[0-9]//g'`; section=`echo $d | sed -e 's/.*\.//g'`; /usr/bin/gawk --posix <$d ' BEGIN { state=0 } $1==".ds" && $2=="xM" { print $3; next } $1==".ds" { ds["\\\\\\*\\("$2] = $3 } $1==".SH" && $2=="NAME" { state=1; next } $1==".SH" && state==1       { exit } /^\./ { next } state==1 { for (i=1;i<=NF;i++) { if ($i=="\\-" || $i=="-") exit; gsub ("\\\\f3", "", $i); gsub ("\\\\f1.*", "", $i); for ( d in ds ) sub (d, ds[d], $i); print $i } }' | while read m; do [ -z "$m" -o "$m" = "\\" ] && continue; t=/usr/share/man/man$section/$m.$section; if $first; then _tfx= ; if false ; then /usr/bin/sed -e "1s/^'\\\\\"! tbl.*/'\\\\\" t/" $d > $d.tmp; _tfx=.tmp; fi; if true ; then /usr/bin/gzip -c $d$_tfx > $d.gz; _tfx=.gz; _sfx=.gz; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/bzip2 -c $d$_tfx > $d.bz2; _tfx=.bz2; _sfx=.bz2; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/lzma -c $d$_tfx > $d.lzma; _tfx=.lzma; _sfx=.lzma; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/xz -c $d$_tfx > $d.xz; _tfx=.xz; _sfx=.xz; fi; u=$m.$section$_sfx; echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; else echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; fi; first=false; done; done; fi
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 chkhelp.1.gz /usr/share/man/man1/chkhelp.1.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 clustervis.1.gz /usr/share/man/man1/clustervis.1.gz

=== man3 ===
test -z "$MAN_PAGES" && MAN_PAGES="QMC.3 QmcContext.3 QmcDesc.3 QmcGroup.3 QmcIndom.3 QmcMetric.3 QmcSource.3 logimport.3 mmv_inc_value.3 mmv_lookup_value_desc.3 mmv_set_value.3 mmv_stats_init.3 mmv_stats_registry.3 pcpintro.3 pmaddderived.3 pmaddderivedtext.3 pmaddprofile.3 pmapi.3 pmatomstr.3 pmconvscale.3 pmctime.3 pmda.3 pmdaattribute.3 pmdacache.3 pmdachildren.3 pmdaconnect.3 pmdadaemon.3 pmdadesc.3 pmdadso.3 pmdaeventarray.3 pmdaeventclient.3 pmdaeventqueue.3 pmdafetch.3 pmdagetoptions.3 pmdahelp.3 pmdainit.3 pmdainstance.3 pmdainterfacemoved.3 pmdalabel.3 pmdamain.3 pmdaname.3 pmdaopenlog.3 pmdapmid.3 pmdaprofile.3 pmdarootconnect.3 pmdasenderror.3 pmdastore.3 pmdatext.3 pmdatrace.3 pmdelprofile.3 pmderivederrstr.3 pmdestroycontext.3 pmdiscoverservices.3 pmdiscoversetup.3 pmdupcontext.3 pmerrstr.3 pmeventflagsstr.3 pmextractvalue.3 pmfetch.3 pmfetcharchive.3 pmfetchgroup.3 pmfreeeventresult.3 pmfreelabelsets.3 pmfreeresult.3 pmfstring.3 pmgetarchiveend.3 pmgetarchivelabel.3 pmgetchildren.3 pmgetchildrenstatus.3 pmgetconfig.3 pmgetcontexthostname.3 pmgetderivedcontrol.3 pmgetindom.3 pmgetindomarchive.3 pmgetoptions.3 pmgetpmnslocation.3 pmgetusername.3 pmgetversion.3 pmhttpnewclient.3 pmiaddinstance.3 pmiaddmetric.3 pmid_helper.3 pmidstr.3 pmiend.3 pmierrstr.3 pmigethandle.3 pmindom_helper.3 pmindomstr.3 pmiputlabel.3 pmiputmark.3 pmiputresult.3 pmiputtext.3 pmiputvalue.3 pmiputvaluehandle.3 pmisethostname.3 pmisettimezone.3 pmisetversion.3 pmistart.3 pmiunits.3 pmiusecontext.3 pmiwrite.3 pmjsonget.3 pmloadasciinamespace.3 pmloadderivedconfig.3 pmloadnamespace.3 pmlocaltime.3 pmlookupdesc.3 pmlookupindom.3 pmlookupindomarchive.3 pmlookupindomtext.3 pmlookuplabels.3 pmlookupname.3 pmlookuptext.3 pmmergelabels.3 pmnameall.3 pmnameid.3 pmnameindom.3 pmnameindomarchive.3 pmnewcontext.3 pmnewcontextzone.3 pmnewzone.3 pmnomem.3 pmnotifyerr.3 pmnumberstr.3 pmopenlog.3 pmparseinterval.3 pmparsemetricspec.3 pmparsetimewindow.3 pmparseunitsstr.3 pmpathseparator.3 pmprintdesc.3 pmprintf.3 pmprintlabelsets.3 pmprintvalue.3 pmreconnectcontext.3 pmrecord.3 pmregisterderived.3 pmsearchinfo.3 pmsearchsetup.3 pmsearchtextindom.3 pmsearchtextquery.3 pmsearchtextsuggest.3 pmsemstr.3 pmseriesdescs.3 pmseriesquery.3 pmseriessetup.3 pmsetdebug.3 pmsetmode.3 pmsetprocessidentity.3 pmsetprogname.3 pmsortinstances.3 pmspeclocalpmda.3 pmsprintf.3 pmstore.3 pmstrncat.3 pmstrncpy.3 pmtime.3 pmtimespec.3 pmtimeval.3 pmtraversepmns.3 pmtrimnamespace.3 pmtypestr.3 pmunitsstr.3 pmunloadnamespace.3 pmunpackeventrecords.3 pmusecontext.3 pmusezone.3 pmwebapi.3 pmwebtimerregister.3 pmwhichcontext.3 pmwhichzone.3"; if [ "true" = "true" ] ; then for d in `echo $MAN_PAGES`; do first=true; base=`echo $d | sed -e 's/\.[0-9]//g'`; section=`echo $d | sed -e 's/.*\.//g'`; /usr/bin/gawk --posix <$d ' BEGIN { state=0 } $1==".ds" && $2=="xM" { print $3; next } $1==".ds" { ds["\\\\\\*\\("$2] = $3 } $1==".SH" && $2=="NAME" { state=1; next } $1==".SH" && state==1     { exit } /^\./ { next } state==1 { for (i=1;i<=NF;i++) { if ($i=="\\-" || $i=="-") exit; gsub ("\\\\f3", "", $i); gsub ("\\\\f1.*", "", $i); for ( d in ds ) sub (d, ds[d], $i); print $i } }' | while read m; do [ -z "$m" -o "$m" = "\\" ] && continue; t=/usr/share/man/man$section/$m.$section; if $first; then _tfx= ; if false ; then /usr/bin/sed -e "1s/^'\\\\\"! tbl.*/'\\\\\" t/" $d > $d.tmp; _tfx=.tmp; fi; if true ; then /usr/bin/gzip -c $d$_tfx > $d.gz; _tfx=.gz; _sfx=.gz; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/bzip2 -c $d$_tfx > $d.bz2; _tfx=.bz2; _sfx=.bz2; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/lzma -c $d$_tfx > $d.lzma; _tfx=.lzma; _sfx=.lzma; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/xz -c $d$_tfx > $d.xz; _tfx=.xz; _sfx=.xz; fi; u=$m.$section$_sfx; echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; else echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; fi; first=false; done; done; fi
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 QMC.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/QMC.3.gz

test -z "$MAN_PAGES" && MAN_PAGES="__pmServerNotifyServiceManagerReady.3 __pmaf.3 __pmcheckattribute.3 __pmcleanmapdir.3 __pmconnectlogger.3 __pmcontrollog.3 __pmconverttime.3 __pmequivindom.3 __pmlocalpmda.3 __pmlogmetatypestr.3 __pmlogwritemark.3 __pmlookupipc.3 __pmmktime.3 __pmnotifythrottle.3 __pmparsectime.3 __pmparsetime.3 __pmprocessexec.3 __pmprocesspipe.3 pmadeltaindom.3 pmagetlog.3 pmapi_internal.3 pmaputlog.3 pmarewritedata.3 pmarewritemeta.3 pmasameindom.3 pmasortindom.3 pmatrydeltaindom.3 pmaundeltaindom.3 pmfault.3 pmfreeprofile.3 pmhash.3 pmparsehostattrsspec.3 pmparsehostspec.3"; if [ "true" = "true" ] ; then for d in `echo $MAN_PAGES`; do first=true; base=`echo $d | sed -e 's/\.[0-9]//g'`; section=`echo $d | sed -e 's/.*\.//g'`; /usr/bin/gawk --posix <$d ' BEGIN { state=0 } $1==".ds" && $2=="xM" { print $3; next } $1==".ds" { ds["\\\\\\*\\("$2] = $3 } $1==".SH" && $2=="NAME" { state=1; next } $1==".SH" && state==1   { exit } /^\./ { next } state==1 { for (i=1;i<=NF;i++) { if ($i=="\\-" || $i=="-") exit; gsub ("\\\\f3", "", $i); gsub ("\\\\f1.*", "", $i); for ( d in ds ) sub (d, ds[d], $i); print $i } }' | while read m; do [ -z "$m" -o "$m" = "\\" ] && continue; t=/usr/share/man/man$section/$m.$section; if $first; then _tfx= ; if false ; then /usr/bin/sed -e "1s/^'\\\\\"! tbl.*/'\\\\\" t/" $d > $d.tmp; _tfx=.tmp; fi; if true ; then /usr/bin/gzip -c $d$_tfx > $d.gz; _tfx=.gz; _sfx=.gz; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/bzip2 -c $d$_tfx > $d.bz2; _tfx=.bz2; _sfx=.bz2; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/lzma -c $d$_tfx > $d.lzma; _tfx=.lzma; _sfx=.lzma; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/xz -c $d$_tfx > $d.xz; _tfx=.xz; _sfx=.xz; fi; u=$m.$section$_sfx; echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; else echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; fi; first=false; done; done; fi

../install-sh -o root -g root -m 755 -d /usr/share/icons/hicolor
for sz in 16 22 24 32 48 64 128 256; do \
    ../install-sh -o root -g root -m 755 -d /usr/share/icons/hicolor/${sz}x${sz}; \
    ../install-sh -o root -g root -m 755 -d /usr/share/icons/hicolor/${sz}x${sz}/apps; \
    for app in ; do \
        icon=/usr/share/icons/hicolor/${sz}x${sz}/apps/${app}.png; \
        ../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 hicolor-${sz}x${sz}-${app}.png ${icon}; \
    done; \
done
../install-sh -o root -g root -m 755 -d /usr/share/icons/hicolor/scalable
../install-sh -o root -g root -m 755 -d /usr/share/icons/hicolor/scalable/apps
for app in ; do \
    ../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${app}.svg /usr/share/icons/hicolor/scalable/apps/${app}.svg; \
done

1.  Read every error listed, carefully:

gpu-monitor:1 Refused to execute script from 'https://192.168.0.100:9090/cockpit/@localhost/*/po.manifest.js' because its MIME type ('text/html') is not executable, and strict MIME type checking is enabled.Understand this error
gpu-monitor:1 Refused to execute script from 'https://192.168.0.100:9090/cockpit/@localhost/*/po.js' because its MIME type ('text/html') is not executable, and strict MIME type checking is enabled.Understand this error

2.  Charts are blank:
GPU Metrics
GPU Active (%)
Temperature (°C)
Memory Used (MiB)

3.  report only works manually:
md@nn06:~$ pmval nvidia.gpuactive

metric:    nvidia.gpuactive
host:      nn06
semantics: instantaneous value
units:     none
samples:   all

       gpu0 
          0 
          0 
^C
md@nn06:~$ 
Thought for 71s
13:25:00 27JUL25, The charts are blank because the date-fns download failed (404 on CDN), and Chart.js time scale needs it for the adapter. I've switched to moment.js adapter in version 0.02.5, which has reliable minified CDNs, and added memory to MiB division. Run this; charts should update with lines for values (e.g., temp at 37).

bash
#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail
LOG_FILE=/var/log/cockpit-pcp-setup.log
exec > >(tee -a "$LOG_FILE") 2>&1
echo "Version 0.02.5 - $(date '+%H:%M:%S %d%b%y')"

# Explicitly purge conflicting packages
echo "Purging conflicting packages..."
sudo apt purge -y cockpit-pcp pcp || true

# Temporarily disable exit on error for purge/autoremove
set +e
sudo apt purge -y "cockpit*" "pcp*" "libpcp*" || true
sudo apt autoremove -y || true
set -e

# Clean duplicate sources if present
sudo sed -i '/deb http:\/\/us.archive.ubuntu.com\/ubuntu noble-backports/d' /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.d/* 2>/dev/null || true
sudo apt update -qq > /dev/null 2>&1

# Initial Checks
echo "Checking NVIDIA drivers..."
if ! nvidia-smi &> /dev/null; then
  echo -e "\e[31mError: NVIDIA drivers not detected. Install first and rerun.\e[0m"
  exit 1
fi
DRIVER_VERSION=$(nvidia-smi --query-gpu=driver_version --format=csv,noheader | cut -d. -f1)

# Enable Universe Repo
set +e
if ! grep -q universe /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.d/*.list; then
  sudo add-apt-repository universe -y
fi

# Add Cockpit PPA for backported compatible version
if ! grep -q "cockpit-project" /etc/apt/sources.list.d/*.list; then
  sudo add-apt-repository ppa:cockpit-project/cockpit -y
fi
sudo apt update
set -e

# Install libnvidia-cfg1 if Needed
if ! dpkg -l | grep -q libnvidia-cfg1-"$DRIVER_VERSION"; then
  sudo apt install -y libnvidia-cfg1-"$DRIVER_VERSION"
fi

# Install Cockpit (without cockpit-pcp) and Dependencies
echo "Installing dependencies..."
sudo apt install -y --no-install-recommends cockpit nvidia-cuda-toolkit bison flex g++ libavahi-common-dev libavahi-client-dev libavahi-glib-dev libmicrohttpd-dev libncurses-dev libreadline-dev libsasl2-dev python3 python3-dev python3-setuptools libpcp3-dev libpcp-pmda3-dev wget autoconf libtool libssl-dev libcairo2-dev libpango1.0-dev libglib2.0-dev

# Build and Install PCP 6.3.7 with NVIDIA PMDA
echo "Cleaning previous build artifacts..."
rm -rf pcp-6.3.7 6.3.7.tar.gz

echo "Downloading PCP source..."
wget https://github.com/performancecopilot/pcp/archive/refs/tags/6.3.7.tar.gz -O 6.3.7.tar.gz

echo "Extracting source..."
tar xzf 6.3.7.tar.gz || { echo -e "\e[31mError: Tar extraction failed. Check if 6.3.7.tar.gz is downloaded correctly.\e[0m"; exit 1; }

cd pcp-6.3.7
echo "Configuring build..."
./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc --localstatedir=/var --with-nvidia=yes 2>&1 | tee config.log
grep -rl ENABLE_NVIDIA_PMDA . | xargs sed -i 's/ENABLE_NVIDIA_PMDA=no/ENABLE_NVIDIA_PMDA=yes/g' || true
echo "Making build..."
make -j$(nproc)
echo "Installing build..."
sudo make install
cd src/pmdas/nvidia
echo "Installing NVIDIA PMDA..."
echo "daemon" | sudo ./Install

# Enable and Start Services
echo "Enabling services..."
sudo systemctl enable --now pmcd pmlogger pmie cockpit.socket

# Set NVIDIA Persistence Mode
echo "Setting persistence mode..."
pkill -f nvidia-persistenced || true
nvidia-smi -pm 1
if ! pgrep nvidia-persistenced; then
  nvidia-persistenced --persistence-mode &
fi

# Restart Services
echo "Restarting services..."
sudo systemctl restart pmcd pmlogger pmie

# Verification with Loop
echo "Verifying metrics..."
for i in {1..3}; do
  if pmprobe -v nvidia.gpuactive > /dev/null 2>&1 && pmprobe -v nvidia.temperature > /dev/null 2>&1 && pmprobe -v nvidia.memused > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "NVIDIA metrics available."
    break
  else
    echo -e "\e[33mWarning: Metrics not ready (attempt $i/3). Sleeping 5s...\e[0m"
    sleep 5
  fi
done
if [ $i -eq 3 ]; then
  echo -e "\e[31mError: Verification failed. Check logs.\e[0m"
  exit 1
fi

# Setup Custom Cockpit Extension as Module with Charts
echo "Setting up Cockpit extension..."
sudo mkdir -p /usr/share/cockpit/gpu-monitor
cd /usr/share/cockpit/gpu-monitor
wget https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/patternfly/4.224.2/css/patternfly.min.css -O patternfly.min.css
wget https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/moment@2.30.1/moment.min.js -O moment.min.js
wget https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chartjs-adapter-moment@1.0.1/dist/chartjs-adapter-moment.min.js -O chartjs-adapter-moment.min.js
wget https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js@4.4.3/dist/chart.umd.min.js -O chart.umd.min.js
echo '{
  "version": 1,
  "name": "gpu-monitor",
  "description": "NVIDIA GPU Monitoring",
  "matches": ["gpu-monitor"],
  "path": "index.html",
  "menu": {
    "gpu-monitor": {
      "label": "GPU Monitor",
      "path": "/gpu-monitor"
    }
  }
}' > manifest.json
echo '


  GPU Monitor
  
  
  
  
  


  
GPU Metrics

  

    

      

        
GPU Active (%)

        

      

    

    

      

        
Temperature (°C)

        

      

    

    

      

        
Memory Used (MiB)

        

      

    

  


' > index.html
echo 'const utilData = { labels: [], datasets: [{ label: "GPU Active (%)", data: [], borderColor: "green" }] };
const tempData = { labels: [], datasets: [{ label: "Temperature (°C)", data: [], borderColor: "blue" }] };
const memData = { labels: [], datasets: [{ label: "Memory Used (MiB)", data: [], borderColor: "orange" }] };
const chartOptions = { scales: { x: { type: "time", time: { unit: "second" } } }, animation: false };

let utilChart, tempChart, memChart;

function updateCharts(metric, value) {
  const now = new Date().toLocaleTimeString();
  switch(metric) {
    case "util":
      utilData.labels.push(now);
      utilData.datasets[0].data.push(value);
      if (utilData.labels.length > 60) { utilData.labels.shift(); utilData.datasets[0].data.shift(); }
      utilChart.update();
      break;
    case "temp":
      tempData.labels.push(now);
      tempData.datasets[0].data.push(value);
      if (tempData.labels.length > 60) { tempData.labels.shift(); tempData.datasets[0].data.shift(); }
      tempChart.update();
      break;
    case "mem":
      memData.labels.push(now);
      memData.datasets[0].data.push(value / 1048576); // Convert bytes to MiB
      if (memData.labels.length > 60) { memData.labels.shift(); memData.datasets[0].data.shift(); }
      memChart.update();
      break;
  }
}

function fetchMetric(cmd, metric) {
  cockpit.spawn(cmd).stream(function(data) {
    const value = parseFloat(data.trim());
    if (!isNaN(value)) updateCharts(metric, value);
  }).catch(function(err) { console.error(`${metric} error:`, err); });
}

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
  utilChart = new Chart(document.getElementById("utilChart"), { type: "line", data: utilData, options: chartOptions });
  tempChart = new Chart(document.getElementById("tempChart"), { type: "line", data: tempData, options: chartOptions });
  memChart = new Chart(document.getElementById("memChart"), { type: "line", data: memData, options: chartOptions });

  setInterval(() => {
    fetchMetric(["pmval", "-s", "1", "-i", "gpu0", "nvidia.gpuactive"], "util");
    fetchMetric(["pmval", "-s", "1", "-i", "gpu0", "nvidia.temperature"], "temp");
    fetchMetric(["pmval", "-s", "1", "-i", "gpu0", "nvidia.memused"], "mem");
  }, 5000);
});' > script.js

# Cleanup
echo "Cleaning up..."
cd ../../..
rm -rf pcp-6.3.7 6.3.7.tar.gz
sudo apt clean > /dev/null 2>&1
sudo apt autoremove -y > /dev/null 2>&1

# Allow port in firewall
sudo ufw allow 9090 || echo "ufw not found, skipping firewall rule."

# Restart Cockpit to load the new plugin
echo "Restarting Cockpit..."
sudo systemctl restart cockpit

# End
echo "Setup complete. Access Cockpit at http://:9090/gpu-monitor (HTTP only; enable HTTPS manually for production security). GPU monitor with live charts ready. If not appearing in navigation, check plugin settings. Login with system credentials."
# reboot  # Commented for testing; uncomment for production if needed after full install.
To guarantee best effort: 1) What browser console errors now? 2) Do the charts update with data? (e.g., temp at 37°C line). 3) If memory shows correctly in MiB (~494 MiB from your pmval).


=== man3i ===
test -z "$MAN_PAGES" && MAN_PAGES="__pmServerNotifyServiceManagerReady.3 __pmaf.3 __pmcheckattribute.3 __pmcleanmapdir.3 __pmconnectlogger.3 __pmcontrollog.3 __pmconverttime.3 __pmequivindom.3 __pmlocalpmda.3 __pmlogmetatypestr.3 __pmlogwritemark.3 __pmlookupipc.3 __pmmktime.3 __pmnotifythrottle.3 __pmparsectime.3 __pmparsetime.3 __pmprocessexec.3 __pmprocesspipe.3 pmadeltaindom.3 pmagetlog.3 pmapi_internal.3 pmaputlog.3 pmarewritedata.3 pmarewritemeta.3 pmasameindom.3 pmasortindom.3 pmatrydeltaindom.3 pmaundeltaindom.3 pmfault.3 pmfreeprofile.3 pmhash.3 pmparsehostattrsspec.3 pmparsehostspec.3"; if [ "true" = "true" ] ; then for d in `echo $MAN_PAGES`; do first=true; base=`echo $d | sed -e 's/\.[0-9]//g'`; section=`echo $d | sed -e 's/.*\.//g'`; /usr/bin/gawk --posix <$d ' BEGIN { state=0 } $1==".ds" && $2=="xM" { print $3; next } $1==".ds" { ds["\\\\\\*\\("$2] = $3 } $1==".SH" && $2=="NAME" { state=1; next } $1==".SH" && state==1   { exit } /^\./ { next } state==1 { for (i=1;i<=NF;i++) { if ($i=="\\-" || $i=="-") exit; gsub ("\\\\f3", "", $i); gsub ("\\\\f1.*", "", $i); for ( d in ds ) sub (d, ds[d], $i); print $i } }' | while read m; do [ -z "$m" -o "$m" = "\\" ] && continue; t=/usr/share/man/man$section/$m.$section; if $first; then _tfx= ; if false ; then /usr/bin/sed -e "1s/^'\\\\\"! tbl.*/'\\\\\" t/" $d > $d.tmp; _tfx=.tmp; fi; if true ; then /usr/bin/gzip -c $d$_tfx > $d.gz; _tfx=.gz; _sfx=.gz; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/bzip2 -c $d$_tfx > $d.bz2; _tfx=.bz2; _sfx=.bz2; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/lzma -c $d$_tfx > $d.lzma; _tfx=.lzma; _sfx=.lzma; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/xz -c $d$_tfx > $d.xz; _tfx=.xz; _sfx=.xz; fi; u=$m.$section$_sfx; echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; else echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; fi; first=false; done; done; fi
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 __pmServerNotifyServiceManagerReady.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmServerNotifyServiceManagerReady.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S __pmServerNotifyServiceManagerReady.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmServerNotifyServiceManagerStopping.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 __pmaf.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/pmAF.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S pmAF.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmAFsetup.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S pmAF.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmAFregister.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S pmAF.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmAFunregister.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S pmAF.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmAFblock.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S pmAF.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmAFunblock.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S pmAF.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmAFisempty.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 __pmcheckattribute.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmCheckAttribute.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 __pmcleanmapdir.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmCleanMapDir.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 __pmconnectlogger.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmConnectLogger.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 __pmcontrollog.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmControlLog.3.gz

=== man3d ===
test -z "$MAN_PAGES" && MAN_PAGES="pmparsedebug.3"; if [ "true" = "true" ] ; then for d in `echo $MAN_PAGES`; do first=true; base=`echo $d | sed -e 's/\.[0-9]//g'`; section=`echo $d | sed -e 's/.*\.//g'`; /usr/bin/gawk --posix <$d ' BEGIN { state=0 } $1==".ds" && $2=="xM" { print $3; next } $1==".ds" { ds["\\\\\\*\\("$2] = $3 } $1==".SH" && $2=="NAME" { state=1; next } $1==".SH" && state==1  { exit } /^\./ { next } state==1 { for (i=1;i<=NF;i++) { if ($i=="\\-" || $i=="-") exit; gsub ("\\\\f3", "", $i); gsub ("\\\\f1.*", "", $i); for ( d in ds ) sub (d, ds[d], $i); print $i } }' | while read m; do [ -z "$m" -o "$m" = "\\" ] && continue; t=/usr/share/man/man$section/$m.$section; if $first; then _tfx= ; if false ; then /usr/bin/sed -e "1s/^'\\\\\"! tbl.*/'\\\\\" t/" $d > $d.tmp; _tfx=.tmp; fi; if true ; then /usr/bin/gzip -c $d$_tfx > $d.gz; _tfx=.gz; _sfx=.gz; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/bzip2 -c $d$_tfx > $d.bz2; _tfx=.bz2; _sfx=.bz2; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/lzma -c $d$_tfx > $d.lzma; _tfx=.lzma; _sfx=.lzma; fi; if false ; then /usr/bin/xz -c $d$_tfx > $d.xz; _tfx=.xz; _sfx=.xz; fi; u=$m.$section$_sfx; echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${d}$_tfx ${t}$_sfx; else echo ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; ../../install-sh -o root -g root -S $u ${t}$_sfx; fi; first=false; done; done; fi
../../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 pmparsedebug.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/pmParseDebug.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S pmParseDebug.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmParseDebug.3.gz
../../install-sh -o root -g root -S pmParseDebug.3.gz /usr/share/man/man3/__pmSetDebugBits.3.gz

for sz in 16 22 24 32 48 64 128 256; do \
    ../install-sh -o root -g root -m 755 -d /usr/share/icons/hicolor/${sz}x${sz}; \
    ../install-sh -o root -g root -m 755 -d /usr/share/icons/hicolor/${sz}x${sz}/apps; \
    for app in ; do \
        icon=/usr/share/icons/hicolor/${sz}x${sz}/apps/${app}.png; \
        ../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 hicolor-${sz}x${sz}-${app}.png ${icon}; \
    done; \
done
../install-sh -o root -g root -m 755 -d /usr/share/icons/hicolor/scalable

for app in ; do \
    ../install-sh -o root -g root -m 644 ${app}.svg /usr/share/icons/hicolor/scalable/apps/${app}.svg; \
done

Cleaning up...
sudo: ufw: command not found
